scripts.dev:scoreboard: npm run build && concurrently "nodemon --watch src/constants/templates --ext hbs --exec ts-node scripts/build-templates.ts" "nodemon --watch src/constants/templates/icons --ext png --exec ts-node scripts/build-png-icons.ts" "nodemon ./src/dev/scoreboard-preview.ts"
scripts.dev:podium: npm run build && concurrently "nodemon --watch src/constants/templates --ext hbs --exec ts-node scripts/build-templates.ts" "nodemon --watch src/constants/templates/icons --ext png --exec ts-node scripts/build-png-icons.ts" "nodemon ./src/dev/podium-preview.ts"
